about.intro: Senior Backend & Fullstack Developer with over 6 years of experience delivering custom digital solutions for businesses. I entered the tech world young out of curiosity and a drive to understand how things work—and how to make them better.
about.specialization: I specialize in building CRMs, ERPs, SaaS platforms, APIs, dashboards, landing pages, and workflow automations that streamline operations and increase team efficiency.
about.journey: I stay current with modern engineering practices, continuously testing new tools and technologies to deliver scalable, reliable, and high-performance solutions. My journey includes founding Bindamy Solutions, where I've built and launched multiple SaaS products and automation tools powering real businesses.

work.title: Founder & CEO / Lead Software Architect
work.longDescription: Bindamy Solutions is a digital solutions company that crafts digital experiences to drive business growth. The company offers enterprise-grade websites, applications, and automation systems, partnering with ambitious companies to build technology that scales. The landing page showcases the company's services, portfolio, technologies, and partner ecosystem. Built with React 19.2.1, TypeScript 5.8.3, Vite 5.4.19, TailwindCSS 3.4.17, shadcn/ui components, i18next for internationalization (English/Portuguese), React Query for state management, and React Router for navigation. The website features multi-language support with automatic language detection, fully responsive mobile-first design, modern UI components built with shadcn/ui and Radix UI primitives, contact forms with validation using React Hook Form and Zod, WhatsApp integration for quick contact, portfolio showcase displaying client projects, partner/trusted by section, services showcase (Web Development, System Architecture, Automation, Digital Strategy), and comprehensive company information. The company has delivered 150+ projects with 98% client satisfaction, serving 50+ enterprise clients with 5+ years of excellence.
